title: [PETITION] Get Rid of Teambuilder and bring back Normal Draft

replies.body: While I agree with this myself the reason why team builder replaced normal draft is because not that many people wanted to play normal draft when it got switched, the queue didn't have enough players to support it correctly which resulted in it being unbalanced in teams and team builder does have enough players to support it correctly. Well it should since Riot hasn't made any moves to tone it down or anything alike that from my view. Hopefully they'll re-release that game mode alongside Dominion in the near future, have a good time in the Fields of Justice and may you be Victorious.
Can I gently remind everyone of my 3 hour queue time experience at peak hours a few weeks ago? I made a post with video proof a few weeks ago.
wow when did you grow a vag
It still has like 30 minute queue times.
They are considering replacing regular ranked with Team Builder ranked... sooo... yeah, probably won't happen if they want the whole game to switch to team builder style.

Yeah but Ranked TeamBuilder is going to be what TeamBuilder should have been.

1. Select 1st and 2nd preferred Roles.
2. Get matched up with 4 other people to make up the rest of your team.
3. You Draft.
4. You Pick.

I'm pretty sure there's even going to be a 'Fill' option if you want to jump the queue a little bit.
You realise that's still going to take them several years to figure out, right?
Only been saying this for months now, this is what the community wants!

Id prefer it over plain normal, because there are so many problems with picks.

alot of toxicity comes from people saying "i picked mid first" or "i called mid first". in draft at least its less cause they have pick order.
And you can ban the broken champs so people stop spamming the same shit over and over again.
Please bring in Normal Draft Mode so I have a chance of actually getting Mid or Top with my jalopy of a computer. Also lets us ban champs that you see every game (Yasuo, Master Yi, Zed, Vayne etc)
I checked all positions and all lanes always said estimated wait time is 'very long' i mean really
